DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine whether ingest creatine nitrate ( CrN ) high dos differentially affect hemodynamic variable compare placebo .
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine short-term ( 7 day ) characteristic ingest creatine nitrate ( CrN ) compare placebo Chem-15 blood safety , heart rate , blood pressure , heart rate blood pressure reactivity self-reported side effect .
DOC.criteria: Apparently healthy At least 6 month immediate prior history resistance training include bench press leg press squat A history treatment metabolic disease ( i.e. , diabetes ) , hypertension , hypotension , thyroid disease , arrhythmias and/or cardiovascular disease Use prescription medication ( birth control allow ) Pregnant nursing plan become pregnant next month Creatine nitrate use last eight week History smoke History drinking ( i.e. , 12 drink per week ) Use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) include ibuprofen ( Advil , Motrin , Nuprin , etc . ) , indomethacin ( Indocin ) , naproxen ( Aleve , Anaprox , Naprelan , Naprosyn ) , piroxicam ( Feldene )
